name: MaFl_Ghalade
oralText: We, the Soldiers of Kion, are family!
introText: Don't speak to me as if you know me, stranger. I am the most feared martial artist in all Madrigal. I can take you down with one finger!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: My name is Ghalade Elore, if you must know. I am the one of the hired Kion Soldiers for Flarine. I am a legend in the world of martial arts, as I've followed in the footsteps of Roentel. Don't cross me.
